00012 /*!\fn create_empty_map( MAP **map , char *name , int XSIZE , int YSIZE , int TILEW , int TILEH , int nbmaxobjects , int nbmaxgroup , int nbmaxanims , int nbtiles , int nbanims )
00013  *\brief Create an empty map
00014  *\param map the map pointer to point on the allocated one
00015  *\param name Name of the map (used for linking between two map )
00016  *\param XSIZE the X size of the map (in tile)
00017  *\param YSIZE the Y size of the map (in tile)
00018  *\param TILEW the Width of a tile
00019  *\param TILEH the Heigh of a tile
00020  *\param nbmaxobjects the maximum number of objects in the map
00021  *\param nbmaxgroup the maximum number of active objects in the map
00022  *\param nbmaxanims the maximum number of aniations in the map
00023  *\param nbtiles the maximum number of tiles in the map
00024  *\param nbanims the maximum number of animations in the map
00025  *\return TRUE on success FALSE on failure
00026  */
00027 int create_empty_map( MAP **map , char *name , int XSIZE , int YSIZE , int TILEW , int TILEH , int nbmaxobjects , int nbmaxgroup , int nbmaxanims , int nbtiles , int nbanims )
00028 {
00029    int x, y;
00030 
00031    /* only here for warning:unused... avoiding, will be removed further */
00032    nbmaxobjects = nbmaxgroup = nbmaxanims = nbtiles = nbanims = 1 ;
00033    nbmaxgroup = nbmaxobjects ;
00034 
00035    /* allocating map */
00036    Malloc( ( *map ) , MAP , 1 );
00037 
00038    if ( !( *map ) )
00039       return FALSE;
00040 
00041    /* allocating grid */
00042    Malloc( ( *map ) -> grid , CELL , XSIZE * YSIZE );
00043 
00044    /* allocating name */
00045    Malloc( ( *map ) -> name , char , ustrsizez( name ) );
00046 
00047    ustrcpy( ( *map ) -> name , name );
00048 
00049    if ( !( *map ) -> grid || !( *map ) -> name )
00050       return FALSE;
00051 
00052    ( *map ) -> XSIZE = XSIZE ;
00053    ( *map ) -> YSIZE = YSIZE ;
00054 
00055    for ( x = 0 ; x < XSIZE ; x++ ) {
00056       for ( y = 0 ; y < YSIZE ; y++ ) {
00057          set_value( ( *map ) , N_TILE , x , y , FALSE );
00058          set_value( ( *map ) , N_ABILITY , x , y , FALSE );
00059          set_value( ( *map ) , N_MUSIC , x , y , FALSE );
00060          set_value( ( *map ) , N_OBJECT , x , y , FALSE );
00061       }
00062    }
00063 
00064    ( *map ) -> TILEW = TILEW;
00065    ( *map ) -> TILEH = TILEH;
00066    ( *map ) -> bgcolor = makeacol( 0 , 0 , 0 , 255 );
00067    ( *map ) -> wirecolor = makeacol( 255 , 255 , 255 , 255 );
00068 
00069    /* Drawing the mousemap */
00070 
00071    ( *map ) -> mousemap = create_bitmap( ( *map ) -> TILEW , ( *map ) -> TILEH );
00072    ( *map ) -> colortile = create_bitmap( ( *map ) -> TILEW , ( *map ) -> TILEH );
00073 
00074    clear_to_color( ( *map ) -> mousemap , makecol( 255 , 255 , 255 ) );
00075    clear_to_color( ( *map ) -> colortile , ( *map ) -> bgcolor );
00076 
00077    /* drawing mousemap */
00078    line( ( *map ) -> mousemap , 0 , ( TILEH >> 1 ) - 2 , ( TILEW >> 1 ) - 3 , 0 , makecol( 255, 0, 0 ) );
00079    floodfill( ( *map ) -> mousemap , 1 , 1 , makecol( 255, 0, 0 ) );
00080 
00081    line( ( *map ) -> mousemap , ( TILEW >> 1 ) - 3 , TILEH - 1 , 0 , ( TILEH >> 1 ) + 1 , makecol( 0 , 255 , 0 ) );
00082    floodfill( ( *map ) -> mousemap , 1 , TILEH - 2 , makecol( 0, 255, 0 ) );
00083 
00084    line( ( *map ) -> mousemap , ( TILEW >> 1 ) + 2 , TILEH - 1 , TILEW - 1 , ( TILEH >> 1 ) + 1 , makecol( 0, 0, 255 ) );
00085    floodfill( ( *map ) -> mousemap , TILEW - 2 , TILEH - 1 , makecol( 0, 0, 255 ) );
00086 
00087    line( ( *map ) -> mousemap , ( TILEW >> 1 ) + 2 , 0 , TILEW - 1 , ( TILEH >> 1 ) - 2 , makecol( 255, 255 , 0 ) );
00088    floodfill( ( *map ) -> mousemap , TILEW - 1 , 0 , makecol( 255, 255, 0 ) );
00089 
00090    /* drawing colortile */
00091    line( ( *map ) -> colortile , 0 , ( TILEH >> 1 ) - 2 , ( TILEW >> 1 ) - 3 , 0 , makecol( 255 , 0 , 255 ) );
00092    floodfill( ( *map ) -> colortile , 1 , 1 , makecol( 255 , 0 , 255 ) );
00093 
00094    line( ( *map ) -> colortile , ( TILEW >> 1 ) - 3, TILEH - 1 , 0 , ( TILEH >> 1 ) + 1 , makecol( 255 , 0 , 255 ) );
00095    floodfill( ( *map ) -> colortile , 1 , TILEH - 2 , makecol( 255 , 0 , 255 ) );
00096 
00097    line( ( *map ) -> colortile , ( TILEW >> 1 ) + 2 , TILEH - 1 , TILEW - 1 , ( TILEH >> 1 ) + 1 , makecol( 255 , 0 , 255 ) );
00098    floodfill( ( *map ) -> colortile , TILEW - 2 , TILEH - 1 , makecol( 255 , 0 , 255 ) );
00099 
00100    line( ( *map ) -> colortile , ( TILEW >> 1 ) + 2 , 0 , TILEW - 1 , ( TILEH >> 1 ) - 2 , makecol( 255 , 0 , 255 ) );
00101    floodfill( ( *map ) -> colortile , TILEW - 1 , 0 , makecol( 255 , 0 , 255 ) );
00102 
00103    ( *map ) -> ptanchorX = ( *map ) -> X = 0 ;
00104    ( *map ) -> ptanchorY = ( *map ) -> Y = 0 ;
00105 
00106    return TRUE;
00107 } /* create_empty_map( ... ) */

00111 /*!\fn set_value( MAP *map , int type , int x , int y , int value )
00112  *\brief Set the value of a cell in a map
00113  *\param map A MAP *map to 'touch'
00114  *\param type It is the type of value to change , it can be N_TILE,N_ABILITY,N_MUSIC,N_OBJECT
00115  *\param x X coordinate of the cell
00116  *\param y Y coordinate of the cell
00117  *\param value Value to give to the cell
00118  *\return TRUE or FALSE
00119  */
00120 int set_value( MAP *map , int type , int x , int y , int value )
00121 {
00122    if ( !map || x >= map -> XSIZE || y >= map -> YSIZE )
00123       return FALSE;
00124 
00125    if ( type == N_TILE ) {
00126 
00127       map -> grid[ x + y * map -> XSIZE ] . tilenumber = value ;
00128 
00129       return TRUE;
00130    }
00131 
00132    if ( type == N_ABILITY ) {
00133 
00134       map -> grid[ x + y * map -> XSIZE ] . ability = value ;
00135 
00136       return TRUE;
00137    }
00138 
00139    if ( type == N_MUSIC ) {
00140 
00141       map -> grid[ x + y * map -> XSIZE ] . music = value ;
00142 
00143       return TRUE;
00144    }
00145 
00146    if ( type == N_OBJECT ) {
00147 
00148       map -> grid[ x + y * map -> XSIZE ] . objectnumber = value ;
00149 
00150       return TRUE;
00151    }
00152 
00153 
00154    return FALSE;
00155 } /* set_value( ... ) */

00159 /*!\fn get_value( MAP *map , int type , int x , int y )
00160  *\brief Get a the tilenumber of a cell item
00161  *\param map A MAP *map to 'touch'
00162  *\param type It is the type of value to change , it can be N_TILE,N_ABILITY,N_MUSIC,N_OBJECT
00163  *\param x X coordinate of the cell
00164  *\param y Y coordinate of the cell
00165  *\return The specified type value of the cell, or FALSE if unavailable
00166  */
00167 int get_value( MAP *map , int type , int x , int y )
00168 {
00169 
00170    if ( !map || x >= map -> XSIZE || y >= map -> YSIZE )
00171       return FALSE;
00172 
00173 
00174    if ( type == N_TILE )
00175       return map -> grid[ x + y * map -> XSIZE ] . tilenumber ;
00176 
00177    if ( type == N_OBJECT )
00178       return map -> grid[ x + y * map -> XSIZE ] . objectnumber ;
00179 
00180    if ( type == N_MUSIC )
00181       return map -> grid[ x + y * map -> XSIZE ] . music ;
00182 
00183    if ( type == N_ABILITY )
00184       return map -> grid[ x + y * map -> XSIZE ] . ability ;
00185 
00186    return FALSE;
00187 
00188 } /* get_value( ... ) */

00192 /*!\fn ScreenToMap( int mx, int my, int *Tilex,int *Tiley,BITMAP *mousemap)
00193  *\brief Convert screen coordinate to map coordinate
00194  *\param mx The 'x' coordinate in pixel
00195  *\param my The 'y' coordinate in pixel
00196  *\param Tilex Output for the generated Tilex
00197  *\param Tiley Output for the generated Tiley
00198  *\param mousemap A mousemap with colors for one tile
00199  *\return TRUE
00200  */
00201 int ScreenToMap( int mx, int my, int *Tilex, int *Tiley, BITMAP *mousemap )
00202 {
00203 
00204    /* SCREEN TO MAP VARIABLES */
00205    int RegionX, RegionY,
00206        RegionDX = 0, RegionDY = 0,
00207        MouseMapX, MouseMapY,
00208        MouseMapWidth, MouseMapHeight, c;
00209 
00210    MouseMapWidth = mousemap -> w;
00211    MouseMapHeight = mousemap -> h;
00212 
00213    /* First step find out where we are on the mousemap */
00214    RegionX = ( mx / MouseMapWidth );
00215    RegionY = ( my / MouseMapHeight ) << 1; /* The multiplying by two is very important */
00216 
00217 
00218    /* Second Step: Find out WHERE in the mousemap our mouse is, by finding MouseMapX and MouseMapY. */
00219 
00220    MouseMapX = mx % MouseMapWidth;
00221    MouseMapY = my % MouseMapHeight;
00222 
00223    /* third step: Find the color in the mouse map */
00224    c = getpixel( mousemap, MouseMapX, MouseMapY );
00225 
00226    if ( c == makecol( 255, 0, 0 ) ) {
00227       RegionDX = -1;
00228       RegionDY = -1;
00229    }
00230 
00231    if ( c == makecol( 255, 255, 0 ) ) {
00232       RegionDX = 0;
00233       RegionDY = -1;
00234    }
00235 
00236    if ( c == makecol( 255, 255, 255 ) ) {
00237       RegionDX = 0;
00238       RegionDY = 0;
00239    }
00240 
00241    if ( c == makecol( 0, 255, 0 ) ) {
00242       RegionDX = -1;
00243       RegionDY = 1;
00244    }
00245 
00246    if ( c == makecol( 0, 0, 255 ) ) {
00247       RegionDX = 0;
00248       RegionDY = 1;
00249    }
00250 
00251    *Tilex = ( RegionDX + RegionX );
00252    *Tiley = ( RegionDY + RegionY );
00253 
00254 
00255    return TRUE;
00256 } /* ScreenToMap( ... ) */

00260 /*!\fn camera_to_scr( MAP **map , int x , int y )
00261  *\brief Center Map on given screen coordinate
00262  *\param map A MAP *map to center on x,y
00263  *\param x the X coordinate (in pixel) to center on;
00264  *\param y the Y coordintae (in pixel) to center on;
00265  *\return TRUE
00266  */
00267 int camera_to_scr( MAP **map , int x , int y )
00268 {
00269    if ( x < 0 )
00270       x = 0;
00271 
00272    if ( y < 0 )
00273       y = 0;
00274 
00275    ( *map ) -> X = x % ( *map ) ->TILEW;
00276    ( *map ) -> Y = y % ( *map ) ->TILEH;
00277    ( *map ) -> ptanchorY = y / ( ( *map ) ->TILEH >> 1 );
00278    ( *map ) -> ptanchorY = ( *map ) -> ptanchorY >> 1;
00279    ( *map ) -> ptanchorY = ( *map ) -> ptanchorY << 1;
00280    ( *map ) -> ptanchorX = ( x + ( ( *map ) -> ptanchorY & 1 ) * ( ( *map ) ->TILEW >> 1 ) ) / ( *map ) ->TILEW;
00281 
00282    return TRUE;
00283 } /* camera_to_scr( ... )*/
00284

00287 /*!\fn camera_to_map( MAP **map , int tx , int ty , int x , int y )
00288  *\brief Center Map on given map coordinate, with x & y offset
00289  *\param map A MAP *map to center on tx+x , ty+y
00290  *\param tx TILEX offset in tile
00291  *\param ty TILEY offset in tile
00292  *\param x X offset in pixel
00293  *\param y Y Offset in pixel
00294  *\return TRUE
00295  */
00296 int camera_to_map( MAP **map , int tx , int ty , int x , int y )
00297 {
00298 
00299    ( *map ) -> ptanchorX = tx;
00300    ( *map ) -> ptanchorY = ty;
00301    ( *map ) -> X = x;
00302    ( *map ) -> Y = y;
00303 
00304    return TRUE;
00305 } /* camera_to_map(...) */

00309 /*!\fn draw_map( MAP *map , BITMAP *bmp , int destx , int desty , int mode)
00310  *\brief Draw a MAP *map on the BITMAP *bmp.
00311  *\param map The Map to draw
00312  *\param bmp The screen destination
00313  *\param destx X offset on bmp
00314  *\param desty Y offste on bmp
00315  *\param mode Drawing mode
00316  *\return TRUE
00317  */
00318 int draw_map( MAP *map , BITMAP *bmp , int destx , int desty , int mode )
00319 {
00320    int a , b ,           /* iterators */
00321        x , y ,           /* temp store of coordinate      */
00322        mvx,mvy ,           /* precomputed offset */
00323        tw , th,          /* number of tile for one screen */
00324        TW2,TH2;          /* size of TILE_W /2 and TILE_H/2 */
00325 
00326    /* computing tw&th */
00327    tw = 1 + ( ( bmp -> w - destx ) / map -> TILEW ) ;
00328    th = 3 + ( ( bmp -> h - desty ) / ( map -> TILEH >> 1 ) ) ;
00329 
00330    TW2 = map -> TILEW>>1 ;
00331    TH2 = map -> TILEH>>1 ;
00332 
00333    mvx = destx - TW2 - map -> X;
00334    mvy = desty - TH2 - map -> Y;
00335 
00336    for ( a = 0 ; a <= tw ; a++ ) {
00337       for ( b = 0 ; b <= th ; b++ ) {
00338 
00339 
00340          x = ( a * map -> TILEW + ( ( b & 1 ) * TW2 ) ) - ( map -> TILEW >> 1 ) + mvx;
00341          y = ( b * TH2 ) + mvy;
00342 
00343          if ( ( a + map -> ptanchorX ) < map->XSIZE && ( b + map -> ptanchorY ) < map->YSIZE ) {
00344 
00345             if ( map -> grid [ a + map -> ptanchorX + ( b + map -> ptanchorY ) * map->XSIZE ] . tilenumber == FALSE ) {
00346 
00347                masked_blit( map -> colortile , bmp , 0 , 0 , x , y , map -> colortile -> w , map -> colortile -> h );
00348 
00349             }
00350 
00351             else {
00352 
00353                /* TODO HERE : add sprite blit */
00354                triangle( bmp , x , y + ( map -> TILEH >> 1 ), x + map-> TILEW , y + ( map->TILEH >> 1 ), x + ( map -> TILEW >> 1 ) , y , makecol( 255, 255, 0 ) );
00355                triangle( bmp , x , y + ( map -> TILEH >> 1 ), x + map-> TILEW , y + ( map->TILEH >> 1 ), x + ( map -> TILEW >> 1 ) , y + map -> TILEH, makecol( 255, 0, 255 ) );
00356 
00357             } /* if( map -> grid... ) ) */
00358 
00359             if ( mode == 1 ) {
00360 
00361                line( bmp , x + ( map -> TILEW >> 1 ) - 2 , y , x , y + ( map -> TILEH >> 1 ) - 1 , map -> wirecolor );
00362                line( bmp , x + ( map -> TILEW >> 1 ) - 2 , y + map -> TILEH - 1 , x , y + ( map -> TILEH >> 1 ) , map -> wirecolor );
00363                line( bmp , x + ( map -> TILEW >> 1 ) + 1 , y + map -> TILEH - 1 , x + map -> TILEW - 1 , y + ( map -> TILEH >> 1 ) , map -> wirecolor );
00364                line( bmp , x + ( map -> TILEW >> 1 ) + 1 , y , x + map -> TILEW - 1 , y + ( map -> TILEH >> 1 ) - 1 , map -> wirecolor );
00365 
00366             }
00367 
00368             /* TODO HERE : check if object,
00369                check if it is already in the library
00370                if yes refresh its ttl
00371                if no add it with the defaut ttl
00372                */
00373 
00374 
00375          } /* if( (a + ...) ) */
00376 
00377       } /* for( a... ) */
00378    } /* for( b... ) */
00379 
00380    /* TODO HERE:
00381 
00382       sort the object list by X and by Y
00383       blit all the sprites of the active list
00384       */
00385 
00386    return TRUE;
00387 
00388 } /* draw_map( ... ) */

00392 /*!\fn load_map( MAP **map , char *filename )
00393  *\brief Load the map from filename
00394  *\param map A MAP *pointer to point on the loaded map
00395  *\param filename The filename of the map to load
00396  *\return TRUE or FALSE
00397  */
00398 int load_map( MAP **map , char *filename )
00399 {
00400    PACKFILE *loaded;
00401 
00402    char temp_name[1024];
00403    MAP temp_map;
00404 
00405 
00406    int it = 0 , it1 = 0 ;
00407 
00408    loaded = pack_fopen( filename , "rb" );
00409 
00410    if( map )
00411       free_map( &(*map) );
00412    if( !(*map) )
00413       Malloc( (*map) , MAP , 1 );
00414 
00415    /* writting name */
00416    it = pack_igetl( loaded );
00417 
00418    pack_fread( temp_name , it , loaded );
00419 
00420    /* writting states */
00421    temp_map . XSIZE  = pack_igetl( loaded );
00422    temp_map . YSIZE  = pack_igetl( loaded );
00423    temp_map . TILEW  = pack_igetl( loaded );
00424    temp_map . TILEH = pack_igetl( loaded );
00425    temp_map . ptanchorX = pack_igetl( loaded );
00426    temp_map . ptanchorY = pack_igetl( loaded );
00427    temp_map . X = pack_igetl( loaded );
00428    temp_map . Y = pack_igetl( loaded );
00429    temp_map . bgcolor = pack_igetl( loaded );
00430    temp_map . wirecolor = pack_igetl( loaded );
00431 
00432    create_empty_map( &( *map ) , temp_name ,
00433          temp_map . XSIZE , temp_map . YSIZE ,
00434          temp_map . TILEW , temp_map . TILEH ,
00435          2000 , 2000 , 2000 , 2000 ,2000 );
00436    (*map ) -> XSIZE = temp_map . XSIZE ;
00437    (*map ) -> YSIZE = temp_map . YSIZE ;
00438    (*map ) -> TILEW = temp_map . TILEW ;
00439    (*map ) -> TILEH = temp_map . TILEH ;
00440    (*map ) -> ptanchorX = temp_map . ptanchorX ;
00441    (*map ) -> ptanchorY = temp_map . ptanchorY ;
00442    (*map ) -> X  = temp_map .  X ;
00443    (*map ) -> Y  = temp_map . Y   ;
00444    (*map ) ->bgcolor  = temp_map . bgcolor ;
00445    (*map ) ->wirecolor = temp_map . wirecolor ;
00446 
00447 
00448    /* saving the grid */
00449    for( it = 0 ; it < (*map ) -> XSIZE ; it ++ ) {
00450       for( it1 = 0 ; it1 < (*map ) -> YSIZE ; it1 ++ ){
00451          (*map ) -> grid[ it + it1 * (*map ) -> XSIZE ] . tilenumber  = pack_igetl( loaded );
00452          (*map ) -> grid[ it + it1 * (*map ) -> XSIZE ] . ability  = pack_igetl( loaded );
00453          (*map ) -> grid[ it + it1 * (*map ) -> XSIZE ] . objectnumber  = pack_igetl( loaded );
00454          (*map ) -> grid[ it + it1 * (*map ) -> XSIZE ] . music  = pack_igetl( loaded );
00455       }
00456    }
00457 
00458    /*load_animlib( loaded , & (*map ) -> libtiles );*/
00459    /*load_animlib( loaded , & (*map ) -> libanims );*/
00460 
00461    pack_fclose( loaded );
00462 
00463 
00464    return TRUE;
00465 } /* load_map( ... ) */
00466

00469 /*!\fn save_map( MAP *map , char *filename )
00470  *\brief Save the map to filename
00471  *\param map A MAP *pointer
00472  *\param filename The filename of the file where to save the map
00473  *\return TRUE or FALSE
00474  */
00475 int save_map( MAP *map , char *filename )
00476 {
00477 
00478    PACKFILE *saved;
00479 
00480    int it = 0 , it1 = 0 ;
00481 
00482    saved = pack_fopen( filename , "wb" );
00483 
00484    /* writting name */
00485    pack_iputl( ustrsizez( map -> name ) , saved );
00486    pack_fwrite( map -> name , ustrsizez( map -> name ) , saved );
00487 
00488    /* writting states */
00489    pack_iputl( map -> XSIZE , saved );
00490    pack_iputl( map -> YSIZE , saved );
00491    pack_iputl( map -> TILEW , saved );
00492    pack_iputl( map -> TILEH , saved );
00493    pack_iputl( map -> ptanchorX , saved );
00494    pack_iputl( map -> ptanchorY , saved );
00495    pack_iputl( map -> X , saved );
00496    pack_iputl( map -> Y , saved );
00497    pack_iputl( map -> bgcolor , saved );
00498    pack_iputl( map -> wirecolor , saved );
00499 
00500    /* saving the grid */
00501    for( it = 0 ; it < map -> XSIZE ; it ++ ) {
00502       for( it1 = 0 ; it1 < map -> YSIZE ; it1 ++ ){
00503          pack_iputl( map -> grid[ it + it1 * map -> XSIZE ] . tilenumber , saved );
00504          pack_iputl( map -> grid[ it + it1 * map -> XSIZE ] . ability , saved );
00505          pack_iputl( map -> grid[ it + it1 * map -> XSIZE ] . objectnumber , saved );
00506          pack_iputl( map -> grid[ it + it1 * map -> XSIZE ] . music , saved );
00507       }
00508    }
00509 
00510    /*save_animlib( saved , map -> libtiles );*/
00511    /*save_animlib( saved , map -> libanims );*/
00512 
00513    pack_fclose( saved );
00514 
00515 
00516    return TRUE;
00517 } /* save_map( ... ) */

00521 /*!\fn free_map( MAP **map )
00522  *\brief Free the map
00523  *\param map The map to free. The pointer will be set to NULL
00524  *\return TRUE or FALSE 
00525  */
00526 int free_map( MAP **map )
00527 {
00528 
00529    if( !(*map) )
00530       return TRUE;
00531    if( (*map) -> grid )
00532    {
00533       Free( ( *map ) -> grid );
00534    }
00535    if( (*map) -> name )
00536    {
00537       Free( ( *map ) -> name );
00538    }
00539    if( (*map) -> colortile )
00540       destroy_bitmap( ( *map ) -> colortile );
00541    if( (*map) -> mousemap )
00542       destroy_bitmap( ( *map ) -> mousemap );
00543 
00544    Free( ( *map ) );
00545 
00546    return TRUE;
00547 } /* free_map( ... ) */
